review: The device is very easy to set up and works very well except for one small but important issue.  When the device reads personal video files that were uploaded to CloudDrive, it displays them with only the duration of the video.  The file name or video name is not displayed, even though it is part of the Cloud Drive stored information.  Photo albums are displayed with the name, but not videos.  That does not sound like a big problem, but if there are many videos and I need to select a particular one it is very difficult.

author: david l. krugman

review: Amazon Fire TV thinks I'm a Brit. Not that there's anything wrong with that in and of itself, but this has several drawbacks when it comes to using this particular device:*It wants to billl me in pounds sterling for content.*The available content appears to be that available in the UK, not in my country of residence. Perversely, this means that much UK-sourced content is not available to me on Amazon Prime video due to local licensing restrictions.*While it was nice that I was able to download the BBC iPlayer, the Beeb has my IP address sussed out as hailing fromCalifornia, not Cambridgeshire, and refuses to send me content.*There appears to be no way to reset the device to recognize my US-based Amazon account. I have deregistered and reregistered the device, but it still thinks I'm British.*I found and tried the "phone me" feature to describe my plight to Amazon, but as I have a US phone number that does not conform to UK Standard Trunk Dialing (or its successor technology), the screen tells me they couldn't reach me.While I have been treated to the British accent version of the welcome video, the system is proving to be, as they say over there, worse than useless. I have written this scathing review because there appears to be no other channel for delivering feedback. I do hope that someone from Amazon reads this and responds. Until then, I am finding this device to be extremely frustrating.
author: Martin Chorich "wahnsinnig"

review: Relatively easy to install, streams well - no breaks or pauses.  One particularly nice feature was being able to resume a Prime video where I'd left off the previous day.  Good tool to increase the value of a Prime membership.Original remote would drain a set of batteries overnight, Amazon provided a quick replacement and return shipping.
